QuestData.Title: Weather Control
QuestData.Description:
This unnatural storm is heavy with magic. By the looks of it, the Nokhud are learning to manipulate the sacred essence of Windsong Rise to create storm elementals. Some have had more success than others...
<Boku gestures to the unfortunate Nokhud initiate nearby still smoking from lightning burns.>
$n, we can't allow them to continue.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Stormbound Essences and $2oa Stormcaller Initiates.
QuestData.RewardText: I don't want to spill blood, but the Nokhud must be stopped.
